unnormalised: **EdTech Buzz: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to That Dream Degree!**
normalised: **EdTech Buzz: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to That Dream Degree!**

unnormalised: Struggling to fund your IIT dreams or that fancy MBA? Don't sweat it, yaar! Scholarship portals are like online treasure chests, overflowing with opportunities. Think of them as a one-stop-shop to finding scholarships for everything from engineering at BITS Pilani to a fine arts course.
normalised: Struggling to fund your I I T dreams or that fancy M B A? Don't sweat it, yaar! Scholarship portals are like online treasure chests, overflowing with opportunities. Think of them as a one stop shop to finding scholarships for everything from engineering at B I T S Pilani to a fine arts course.

unnormalised: These portals, like Buddy4Study and Vidyadhan, list scholarships from various orgs, both government and private. Imagine applying for a scholarship at 22:00 hrs on 03/03/2024 while chilling with chai! They make it super easy to filter based on your academic qualifications, caste, and even your family's income (Rs. 5 lakh per annum max in some cases).
normalised: These portals, like Buddy4Study and Vidyadhan, list scholarships from various organizations, both government and private. Imagine applying for a scholarship at twenty two hundred hours on third march two thousand and twenty four while chilling with chai! They make it super easy to filter based on your academic qualifications, caste, and even your family's income (rupees five lakh per annum maximum in some cases).

unnormalised: Plus, a lot of them have started offering personalised recommendations. No more endlessly scrolling through irrelevant options! Just feed in your details, and boom, relevant scholarships pop up. My cousin, Priya from Patna, bagged a Rs. 50,000 scholarship at 11:00 on 15/08/2023 through one of these sites! Check 'em out today! Last date for many applications is coming up soon like 31/12/2024.
normalised: Plus, a lot of them have started offering personalized recommendations. No more endlessly scrolling through irrelevant options! Just feed in your details, and boom, relevant scholarships pop up. My cousin, Priya from Patna, bagged a rupee fifty thousand scholarship at eleven hundred hours on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty three through one of these sites! Check them out today! Last date for many applications is coming up soon like thirty first december two thousand and twenty four.
